ModMetaData.name: Turbinestuffed
ModMetaData.author: Skullywag
ModMetaData.description:
Changes vanilla wind turbines so that they can be made with stuff.
Factor Health Flammable Beauty Steel: 1x power gen (vanilla) 150 8% -12 Silver: 1.1x power gen 105 8% -12 Gold: 1.2x power gen 90 8% -12 Plasteel: 1.4x power gen 420 4% -12 Uranium: 1.5x power gen 375 0% -12
